description: Try our easy to follow Tuna, Carrot & Capsicum Rice Paper Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice paper rolls,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Dairy free
name: Tuna, Carrot & Capsicum Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice according to packet instructions. Gently mash chickpeas, then mix with rice, lemon juice, tahini, tuna and pepper, to taste.
Steam and slice pumpkin. Slice lettuce, capsicum, and shred carrot.

Using rice paper wrappers, soak one at a time in warm water for 30 seconds, and then place on a damp tea towel. Place an 1/8 ingredients into each wrap and roll tightly. Repeat and serve with lemon wedges.
